This is a fork of Aptalca's RDP-Calibre is a combo docker for calibre web server. [br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where your Calibre library/database resides (I have mine in Dropbox)[br][br] [b]/opt/calibre[/b] Calibre-Server's program files. I have them stored in the unRAID array. [br][br] [b]/downloads[/b] unRAID's download folder. To automatically add new book downloads to Calibre[br][br]
In the Variables Section (After Opening Advanced View) please make sure you enter:[br][br] [b]/CALUSER[/b] The username to login into the Calibre web page.[br][br] [b]/CALPASSWORD[/b] The password for the user above. [br][br]
To scan automatically for new books, edit the cronjob by changing the paths. Edit cron by typing: [br] crontab -e [br][br]
Don't forget to enter in the host port and app folder. [br][br]
[span style='color: #E80000;']8080[/span] is the port for the calibre server web gui[br]
Your calibre is only available through a web interface.
Containers.Overview: Calibre is an e-book management software.
